description: Try our easy to follow Honey Glazed Carrots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steamed vegetable,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Honey Glazed Carrots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam over simmering water until just tender (electric steamer can be used on high). Remove from heat, discard water and add butter, honey and cumin into a saucepan.
When butter has melted, add carrots and toss for 2 minutes until heated through and glossy. Transfer to a serving dish. Add feta and toasted slivered almonds. Serve warm.
